lead_paragraph: The Glasgow Rangers lost, 1-0, at Werder Bremen but still advanced to the UEFA Cup quarterfinals, along with Sporting Lisbon, which defeated Bolton by 1-0. Diego scored in the 58th minute at Bremen, but Rangers won the home-and-home, total-goals series on 2-1 goal aggregate. At Lisbon, Bruno Pereirinha curled in a shot in the 85th minute to give Sporting Lisbon a 2-1 aggregate victory.
